SELECT COUNT(1) FROM bl_device WHERE 1=1
AND device_id like concat('%',#{deviceId},'%')
AND pc_id like concat('%',#{pcId},'%')
AND name like concat('%',#{name},'%')
AND status =#{status}
SELECT g.* FROM bl_device_advert d LEFT JOIN bl_advert g ON d.`advert_id`=g.id WHERE d.`device_id`=#{deviceId} ORDER BY d.`weight`
SELECT g.* FROM bl_device_game d LEFT JOIN bl_game g ON d.`game_id`=g.id WHERE d.`device_id`=#{deviceId} ORDER BY d.`weight`

SELECT g.*,d.res_url FROM `bl_game_netres` g LEFT JOIN bl_device_game_netres d ON g.`game_id`=d.`game_id` AND g.`property`=d.`property` AND d.`device_id`=#{deviceId} WHERE CONCAT(",",#{gameIds},",") LIKE CONCAT("%,",g.game_id,",%")
SELECT * FROM bl_device_game_netres d WHERE d.`device_id`=#{deviceId}
